info.title: Controller API
info.description: API for managing resources associated with Controllers.

get.summary: Lists all accounts in a specific auth method.

post.summary: Creates a single account in the provided auth method.
Sets the password for the provided account.
Sets the password for the provided account.
Creates a single AuthMethod
Authenticate a user to an scope and retrieve an authentication token.

parameters.name: auth_method_id
parameters.description:
The id to the authmethod in the system being used for authentication.  The auth method must be in the scope
being logged in to.

post.summary: Creates a single Group
Adds Users as members to a Group
Removes the specified members from a Group.
Set a Group's members to exactly the list of provided in the request, removing any members that are not specified.
Creates a HostCatalog
post.description: Creates a single host catalog under the specified scope

get.description: Gets a single Host Catalog with the provided identifier.

get.summary: List all HostSets under the specific catalog

post.summary: Create a HostSet
Adds existing Hosts to a Host Set.
Removes Hosts from the Host Set.
Sets the Hosts on the Host Set.

get.summary: List all Hosts for the specified catalog

post.summary: Create a single Host
Creates a single Role
Adds grants to a role
Adds Users and/or Groups to a Role
Removes grants from a role.
Removes the specified Users and/or Groups from a Role.
Set grants for a role, removing any grants that are not specified in the request.
Set Users and/or Groups to a Role, removing any principals that are not specified in the request.

get.summary: Lists all Scopes within the scope of the token making the request

post.summary: Creates a single Scope
Creates a single Target
Adds existing Host Sets to a Target.
Removes Host Sets from the Target.
Sets the Host Sets on the Target.
Creates a single User

grant_scope_id.description:
The scope the grants will apply to. If the role is at the global scope,
this can be an org or project. If the role is at an org
scope, this can be a project within the org. It is invalid for
this to be anything other than the role's scope when the role's scope is
a project.

principal_ids.description:
The IDs (only) of principals that are assigned to this role.
Output only.

principals.description:
The principals that are assigned to this role.
Output only.

grant_strings.description:
The grants that this role provides for its principals.
Output only.

grants.description:
The parsed grant information.
Output only.

controller.api.resources.users.v1.User.title: User contains all fields related to a User resource

version.description:
The version ensures the group hasn't changed since it was last retrieved and if
it has the request will fail.

host_ids.description:
A list of host IDs which will be added to this host set. Each host
referenced here must be a child of the same host catalog that this host
set is a child of.

version.description:
The version ensures the role hasn't changed since it was last retrieved and if
it has the request will fail.

The version ensures the role hasn't changed since it was last retrieved and if
it has the request will fail.

host_set_ids.title:
A list of host set IDs which will be added to this target. Each host set
referenced here must be a child of a host catalog in the same scope as this
target

auth_method_id.description:
The id to the authmethod in the system being used for authentication.  The auth method must be in the scope
being logged in to.

token_type.description: This can be "cookie" or "token".  If not provided, "token" will be used.

credentials.description:
credentials are the different possible credential names depending on what type of auth method is used.
For password auth method: should include only "name" and "password".

token_type.description: This can be "cookie" or "token".  If not present, "token" should be assumed.

version.description:
The version ensures the group hasn't changed since it was last retrieved and if
it has the request will fail.

host_ids.description:
A list of host IDs which should not be in the host set when this request
returns.

version.description:
The version ensures the role hasn't changed since it was last retrieved and if
it has the request will fail.

The version ensures the role hasn't changed since it was last retrieved and if
it has the request will fail.

host_set_ids.description:
A list of host set IDs which should not be in the target when this request
returns.

version.description:
The version ensures the group hasn't changed since it was last retrieved and if
it has the request will fail.

host_ids.description:
A list of host IDs which will be set on this host set. Each host
referenced here must be a child of the same host catalog that this host
set is a child of.

version.description:
The version ensures the role hasn't changed since it was last retrieved and if
it has the request will fail.

The version ensures the role hasn't changed since it was last retrieved and if
it has the request will fail.

host_set_ids.description:
A list of host set IDs which will be set on this target. Each host set
referenced here must be a child of a host catalog in the same scope as this
target.

google.protobuf.NullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.
